Class Fridge

java.lang.Object
Fridge
public class Fridge extends Object
Homework 3 Fridge class ensures producer thread can store things in it and the consumer thread can take the data when its ready. Makes sure the program is thread-safe. Thus, the analogy...

rev. 1 17/7/2021
